reviewText: What the truly capitalistic offers the people, with the progressive definition of what greed is this contry would not be as great as it is. this is what built this country with the highest standard of living ever.
Excellent resource for helping students grasp business basics.  Stossel does a great job of narrating thought both sides of the issues.
An old report, but still valid today and very well done.

This video is interesting.  It is nice and short.  It gives a lot of information about the economy, but it is easy to understand.  I'd recommend teachers play this video social studies class- can finish it within 1 class period.

Those Stossel specials are sooooo good. They are really an open-minder. Greed, for example, contains the basic concepts of free market spirit and Stossel gets a moderate role playing devil's advocate on key questions.
